title: Optimize Crane Work Sequence
description: A planner reviews the initial work sequence for a quay crane and sees it can be improved to reduce travel time for yard equipment.

tasks.description: Generate the initial, default work queue for a crane.
tasks.expected_outcome: The planner has the list of container moves for QC-01.

tasks.description: Analyze the sequence, noting that it involves picking containers from many different, distant yard blocks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The planner identifies that the sequence is inefficient for the yard equipment.

tasks.description: Manually re-sequence the crane's work queue to prioritize loading all containers from one yard block before moving to the next.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work queue is reordered to improve yard efficiency, and the new sequence is sent to the crane operator.
